summary: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.
cast: Anne Hathaway|Hugh Dancy|Cary Elwes|Aidan McArdle|Joanna Lumley|Lucy Punch|Jennifer Higham|Minnie Driver|Eric Idle|Steve Coogan|Jimi Mistry|Vivica A. Fox|Parminder Nagra|Jim Carter|Patrick Bergin|Donna Dent|Ankita Malkan|Sally-Ann Tingle|Aimee Brigg|Helen Norton|Emmet Kirwan|Christopher Kelly|Audrey Hamm|Mikel Murfi|Rory Keenan|Aonghus Og McAnally|Aaron Monaghan|Heidi Klum|Alvaro Lucchesi|Paraic Breathnach|Daniel Naprous|Nora-Jane Noone|Pat Kinevane|Andrea Irvine|Merrina Millsapp|Amelia Crowley|Pat McGrath|Susan Mary Ward|Jonathan Delaney Tynan|Trevor Fehin|David Gilna|Johnny Nguyen|Anna Nugent|Tommy O'Haver|Rachel Rath|Claire Michelle Scally|Gerry Wade|Howard Wilson|Ron Yuan
title: Hechizada
